short_summary: 1 Total Volatile Base Nitrogen Distillation and Titration Unit
description: 1 Unit of distillation and titration of total volatile base nitrogen.
full_summary:
## Tender for Liquid and Solid Analyzer
**Reference Number:** CB-456-58617080
**Solicitation Number:** 2025-00159

**Publication and Closing Dates:**
- The government of Canada has issued a **Public Notice** on *November 14, 2024*, inviting bids for the procurement of a Total Volatile Base Nitrogen Distillation and Titration Unit (TV-NBTu).
- The **Tender Closing Date:** *December 24, 2024, at 14:00:00*.

**Contractual Details:**
- The contract value and terms shall be determined upon selection of the successful bidder.
- The selected contractor will be required to provide maintenance and equipment services as per details in the draft supply arrangement attached.
- The procuring entity reserves the right to cancel bids and amend this solicitation without prior notification to interested parties.

**Technical Specifications and Requirements:**
- The TV-NBTu must be the latest model commercially available.
- Deliveries are expected to begin on *December 9, 2024,* with completion scheduled for *March 31, 2025.*
- The contractor will be expected to provide training and support for personnel handling the equipment.

**Trade Agreements:**
The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Points of Contact:**
For more information, please contact:
 Jo'Anne Cassidy, Acquisitions and Contracting (Procurement, GSINS)
 Phone: (613) 355-8857
 Email: [joanne.cassidy@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:joanne.cassidy@inspection.gc.ca) 
- Address: 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, K1A 0Y9.
